episode: My former friends stopped talking to me and it was heartbreaking and made me feel very lonely

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Both of my friends betrayed me at once :-/ I feel like I don't have anyone

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds really painful.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It is one of the most painful things I've ever experienced tbh

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It can be really tough to feel so hurt by people you trust.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: They told me they'd never do something like this which is what makes it hurt the most

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: The betrayal feels worse because they promised they wouldn't.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Exactly, and because they knew what I had been through before

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: They knew your past and still chose to hurt you.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: yes, exactly. I just have to work on getting through it I guess

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Time to focus on healing and moving forward.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, I agree. Any suggestions on how?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Take care of yourself, maybe talk to someone you can trust.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Absolutely. I'm working on that as we speak

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a great start.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Thank you for your help

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: You're welcome, feel better soon.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: You too <3

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Aw, thanks, take care!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: You as well

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: You too!
